H0.text: Who painted 'Rouen Cathedral: Sunset' found in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, USA. Claude Lorraine

H1.text: Who painted 'Rouen Cathedral: Sunset' found in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, USA. Camille Pissarro

H2.text: Who painted 'Rouen Cathedral: Sunset' found in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, USA. Alfred Sisley

H3.text: Who painted 'Rouen Cathedral: Sunset' found in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, USA. MONET

A4.text: In 1895, he exhibited 20 paintings of Rouen Cathedral, showcasing the façade in different conditions of light, weather and atmosphere.

A5.text: From the 1880s onwards—and particularly in the 1890s—Monet's series of paintings of specific subjects sought to document the different conditions of light and weather.
